name: Lawmaker (itch)
description:
You are now, the mighty Lawmaker.  All of the worlds inhabitants depend on your wisdom. Make your decisions carefully and remember, laws you make will last for an eternity.

Ömer Faruk Seyithanoğlu - Game Designer, Game Programmer - https://crunc2h.itch.io/

Mehmet Ertürk - Game Designer, Text Writer, Sound Designer - https://misnex.itch.io/

Elif Göktürk - Game Designer,  Artist - https://elif-gokturk.itch.io/

Umut Güven - Game Designer - https://umutguven.itch.io/

Burak Yakar - Artist
